mapper.select: select no, name from users where email=#{email} and password=#{password}
select no, name, email from users where email=#{email}
select no, name, gender from users where no=#{no}

choose.when: update users set name=#{name}, gender=#{gender} where no=#{no}
choose.otherwise: update users set name=#{name}, password=#{password}, gender=#{gender} where no=#{no}
